message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $15,000.  I think it will be very valuable to you, even more so than my minimum price. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
